titleStmt.title: The speech or confession of Sir Alexander Carew Baronet: who was beheaded on Tower-hill on Munday Decemb. 23. 1644. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Carew, Alexander, Sir, 1609-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Bates at the Maiden-head on Snow-hill, neere the Conduit. And J.W.J. in the Old-baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Maiden-head on Snow-hill, neere the Conduit. And J.W.J. in the Old-baily
